verses.name: Leviticus 14:53
verses.text: But he shall let go the living bird out of the city into the open fields, and make an atonement for the house: and it shall be clean.

verses.name: Leviticus 14:54
verses.text: This is the law for all manner of plague of leprosy, and scall,

verses.name: Leviticus 14:55
verses.text: And for the leprosy of a garment, and of a house,

verses.name: Leviticus 14:56
verses.text: And for a rising, and for a scab, and for a bright spot:

verses.name: Leviticus 14:57
verses.text: To teach when it is unclean, and when it is clean: this is the law of leprosy.
